title: Bug 124067: Relative path not supported when selecting XML file
description: When selecting an XML file, the relative path should be supported. Currently, only the absolute path is supported.
OB: When selecting the XML file, the file's absolute path is being used. The system does not support using a relative path.
EB: The system should support both relative and absolute paths when selecting an XML file.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the software application.
2. Navigate to the file selection menu.
3. Select an XML file using a relative path.
4. Observe that the system does not recognize the relative path and uses the absolute path instead.
